article.title: Northrop Grumman Wins Follow-On Enterprise Human Resources Integration Blanket Purchase Agreement
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Office of Personnel Management has awarded the Northrop Grumman Corporation a $100 million follow-on blanket purchase agreement to electronically convert and store federal employee records for streamlined access to information. To support the Enterprise Human Resources Integration program, the company will provide project management, systems integration, lifecycle deployment support and systems engineering services to support the program's implementation and maintenance.
